title: How do we read literature? - Quora

response.answer_text: We read literature through the lens of our own experience. That’s why I’ve never bought into the lists of the greatest books of all time. Whose list is that anyway? Yes, public popularity may play a role in that decision, but when it is all said and done, that is some individual’s list of favorites. I say, make your own list and stand by it because that is a “best of” that will always be meaningful to you. And when it comes to literature, whose opinion really matters but yours?
